Token.Abstract: The CatalyzeHTTPManager class provides an abstracted layer of functionality in order to not clutter to core of the catalyze.io iOS SDK. Network calls were viewed as a separate entity of the SDK entirely. In order to emphasize this, ALL network traffic in or out of the SDK goes through one of the following four methods. The library used for network traffic is AFNetworking found here http://afnetworking.com/ .
Performs a GET request at the given url and executes the CatalyzeHTTPResponseBlock upon completion of the request whether it succeeded or failed.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: the url to direct the request to

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs a POST request at the given url with the given parameters and executes the CatalyzeHTTPResponseBlock upon completion of the request whether it succeeded or failed.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: the url to direct the request to

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: the key value pairs to be sent to the specified url

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Identical to doPost:withParams:block: except that this method has a CatalyzeHTTPArrayResponseBlock instead of the basic HTTP response.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: the url to direct the request to

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: the key value pairs to be sent to the specified url

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs a PUT request at the given url with the given parameters and executes the CatalyzeHTTPResponseBlock upon completion of the request whether it succeeded or failed.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: the url to direct the request to

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: the key value pairs to be sent to the specified url

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs a DELETE request at the given url and executes the CatalyzeHTTPResponseBlock upon completion of the request whether it succeeded or failed.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: the url to direct the request to

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion
